channel.title: posts/Russia to Azerbaijan
channel.description: Team Geekout (Jamie&Kai) geeked out on the Mongol Rally 2011

item.title: Mongol Rally Handbook

item.description:
Hi chaps - Have you been to the Mongol Rally Online Handbook to look at the page about choosing your route?

http://mongolrally.theadventurists.com/index.php?mode=handbook&handbook=mongolrally11&page=which-way-2011

Cheers, Rob (Mongol Rally Chief)
